english.segment2: I will enter His gates with thanksgiving in my heart. I will enter His courts with praise. I will say this is the day that the Lord has made. I will rejoice for He has made me glad. He has made me glad (2X). I will rejoice for He has made me glad, glad, glad. He has made me glad (2X). I will rejoice for He has made me glad
english.segment3: Hey, hey. Here we go. Hey, hey. Cheerio
english.segment4: I will enter His gates with thanksgiving in my heart. I will enter His courts with praise. I will say this is the day that the Lord has made. I will rejoice for He has made me glad. He has made me glad (2X). I will rejoice for He has made me glad, glad, glad. He has made me glad (2X). I will rejoice for He has made me glad. (repeat)
english.segment5: Here we go. Ha, ha. Get funky. Who's your daddy
